attributes.action: allow the use of electric personal assistive mobility devices (or segways) on public highways in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Electric personal assistive mobility devices (commonly known as segways)are an
effective way to stop people using their cars for short journeys.
Currently they are illigal to use on public highways.
I am petitioning the Prime Minister to allow electric personal assistive mobility devices the same rights as bicycles on UK highways.
